Verses: 1 pinbu avar ennaik kizhakkukku edhirE parisuththa Sthalaththukkup puRavaasal vazhiyE thirumbappaNNinaar; adhu poottappattirundhadhu.

2 appozhudhu karththar ennai nOkki: indha vaasal thiRakkappadaamal poottappattirukkum; oruvarum idhaRkuL pravEsippadhillai; iSravElin dhEvanaagiya karththar idhaRkuL pravEsiththaar, aagaiyaal idhu poottappattirukkavENdum.

3 idhu� adhipadhikkE uriyadhu, adhipadhi karththarudaiya sannidhiyil pOjanampaNNumpadi idhil utkaaruvaan; avan vaasal maNdabaththin vazhiyaaip pravEsiththu, maRupadiyum adhin vazhiyaaip puRappaduvaan endraar�.

4 pinbu avar ennai vadakku vaasalvazhiyaai aalayaththin mugappilE azhaiththukkoNdupOnaar; idhO, karththarudaiya aalayam, karththarudaiya magimaiyaal niRaindhadhai naan kaNdu, mugankuppuRa vizhundhEn�.

5 appozhudhu karththar ennai nOkki: manupuththiranE karththarudaiya aalayaththin sagala niyamangaLaiyum adhin sagala sattangaLaiyunkuRiththu naan unnOdE solvadhaiyellaam nee un manadhilE gavaniththu, un kaNgaLinaalE paarththu, un kaadhugaLinaalE kEttu, parisuththa Sthalaththinudaiya ellaa vaasaRpadigaLin vazhiyaai aalayaththukkuL pravEsippadhum adhilirundhu puRappaduvadhum innavidhamendru nee aalOsiththup paarththu,
6 iSravEl vamsaththaaraagiya kalagakkaararOdE sollavENdiyadhu ennavendraal: karththaraagiya aaNdavar uraikkiRaar, iSravEl vamsaththaarE, neengaL seydha sagala aruvaruppugaLum pOdhum.

7 neengaL enakku seluththavENdiya aagaaramaagiya niNaththaiyum raththaththaiyum seluththugaiyil, en aalayaththaip parisuththakkulaichchalaakkumpadi viruththasEdhanamillaadha irudhayamum viruththasEdhanamillaadha maamsamumuLLa anniya puththirarai en parisuththa SthalaththukkuL irukkiRadhaRkaaga azhaiththukkoNdu vandheergaL; neengaL seydha ellaa aruvaruppugaLinaalum avargaL en udanpadikkaiyai meeRinaargaL.
8 neengaL en parisuththa vaSthukkaLin kaavalaik kaavaamal, ungaLukku ishtamaanavargaLai en parisuththa SthalaththilE en kaavalaik kaakkiRadhaRkaaga vaiththeergaL.

9 karththaraagiya aaNdavar sollugiRadhu ennavendraal: iSravEl puththirarin naduvil irukkiRa sagala anniya puththirarilum, viruththasEdhanamillaadha irudhayamum viruththasEdhanamillaadha maamsamumuLLa anniya puththiran oruvanum en parisuththa SthalaththukkuL pravEsippadhillai.
10 iSravEl vazhithappippOgaiyil, ennai vittu dhooramaanavargaLum, ennaivittu vazhithappith thangaL naragalaana vikkiragangaLaip pinpatrinavargaLumaagiya lEviyarum thangaL akkiramaththai sumappaargaL.

11 aagilum avargaL en aalayaththin vaasalgaLaik kaaththu, en aalayaththil oozhiyancheydhu, en parisuththa SthalaththilE paNividaikkaararaayiruppaargaL; avargaL janangaLukkaaga thaganapaligaLaiyum matrap paligaLaiyum seluththi, ivargaLukku oozhiyancheygiRadhaRku ivargaL munbaaga en parisuththa SthalaththilE paNividaikkaararaayiruppaargaL.

12 avargaL ivargaLudaiya naragalaana vikkiragangaLukku munbaaga nindru ivargaLukku oozhiyancheydhu, iSravEl vamsaththaarai akkiramaththil vizhappaNNinapadiyinaal, naan en kaiyai avargaLukku virOdhamaai uyarththinEn, avargaL thangaL akkiramaththai sumappaargaL endru karththaraagiya aaNdavar sollugiRaar.

13 ivargaL enakku aasaariyaraai aaraadhanai seyyumpadi en sameebaththil varaamalum, magaa parisuththamaana Sthalaththil en parisuththa vaSthukkaLil yaadhondraiyum kittaamalum irukkavENdum, avargaL thangaL lachchaiyaiyum thaangaL seydha aruvaruppugaLaiyum sumakkakkadavargaL.
14 aalayaththin sagala vElaigaLukkum adhil seyyappadavENdiya ellaavatriRkum naan avargaLai adhil kaavalkaakkiRavargaLaayirukkak kattaLaiyiduvEn.

15 iSravEl puththirarE, ennaivittu vazhithappippOgaiyil, en parisuththa Sthalaththin kaavalaik kaakkiRa saadhOkkin puththiraraagiya lEviyar ennum aasaariyargaLE enakku aaraadhanai seyya en sameebaththil sErndhu, niNaththaiyum raththaththaiyum enakku seluththa en sannidhiyil niRpaargaLendru karththaraagiya aaNdavar sollugiRaar.
16 ivargaL en parisuththa SthalaththukkuL pravEsippaargaL; ivargaLE enakku aaraadhanai seyya en peedaththaik kittivandhu, en kaavalaik kaappaargaL.

17 utpraagaaraththin vaasalgaLukkuL pravEsikkiRapOdhu saNalnool vaSthirangaLai uduththikkoLvaargaLaaga; avargaL utpraagaaraththin vaasalgaLilum, uLLEyum aaraadhanai seygaiyil aattumayir uduppaith tharikkalaagaadhu.
18 avargaLudaiya thalaigaLil saNalnool kullaakkaLaiyum, avargaLudaiya idaigaLil saNalnool salladangaLaiyum tharikkavENdum; vErvaiyuNdaakkaththakkadhondraiyum araiyil kattalaagaadhu.

19 avargaL veLippraagaaramaagiya puRamutraththilE janangaLidaththil pOgumpOdhu, avargaL thaangaL aaraadhanaiseyyum samayaththil uduththiyirundha thangaL vaSthirangaLaik kazhatri, avaigaLaip parisuththa aRaiveedugaLil vaiththu, vERE vaSthirangaLai uduththikkoLLakkadavargaL; thangaL vaSthirangaLaalE janangaLaip parisuththappaduththalaagaadhu.
20 avargaL thangaL thalaigaLai siraiyaamalum, thangaL mayirai neeLamaai vaLarkkaamalum, thangaL thalaimayiraik kaththarikkakkadavargaL.
21 aasaariyargaLil oruvanum utpraagaaraththukkuL pravEsikkumpOdhu, dhraatcharasam kudikkalaagaadhu.
22 vidhavaiyaiyum thaLLividappattavaLaiyum avargaL vivaagampaNNaamal, iSravEl vamsaththaaLaagiya kannigaiyaiyaagilum oru aasaariyanin manaiviyaayirundha vidhavaiyaiyaagilum vivaagampaNNalaam.
23 avargaL parisuththamaanadhaRkum parisuththamallaadhadhaRkum, theettaanadhaRkum theettallaadhadhaRkum irukkum viththiyaasaththai en janaththukkup pOdhiththu, avargaLukkuth theriyappaNNakkadavargaL.

24 vazhakkirundhaal avargaL nyaayantheerkka aayaththamaayirundhu, en nyaayangaLinpadi adhaith theerththu, ennudaiya paNdigaigaLil ellaam en nyaayappramaaNaththaiyum en kattaLaigaLaiyum kaikkoNdu en OivunaatkaLaip parisuththamaakkakkadavargaL.

25 thagappan, thaai, kumaaran, kumaaraththi, sagOdharan, purushanukku vaazhkkaippadaadha sagOdhari ennum ivargaLudaiya savaththinaal avargaL theettuppadalaamEyallaamal, avargaLiloruvanum seththa oruvanidaththilpOith theettuppadalaagaadhu.
26 avan suththigarikappattapinbu, avanukku EzhunaaL eNNappadavENdum.

27 avan parisuththa Sthalaththil aaraadhanai seyyumpadi parisuththa SthalamirukkiRa utpraagaaraththukkuL pravEsikkiRanaaLilE, avan thanakkaagap paavanivaaraNa paliyai seluththakkadavan endru karththaraagiya aaNdavar sollugiRaar.
28 avargaLukkuriya sudhandharamennavendraal: naanE avargaL sudhandharam; aagaiyaal iSravElil avargaLukkuk kaaNiyaatchiyaik kodaadhiruppeergaLaaga; naan avargaL kaaNiyaatchi.
29 pOjanapaliyaiyum paavanivaaraNapaliyaiyum kutranivaaraNapaliyaiyum avargaL pusippaargaL; iSravElilE poruththanai paNNappattadhellaam avargaLudaiyadhaayiruppadhaaga.

30 sagalavidha mudhaRkanigaLil ellaam mundhina palanum, neengaL kaaNikkaiyaai seluththum evvidhamaanaporuLgaLum aasaariyargaLudaiyadhaayiruppadhaaga; ungaL veettil aaseervaadham thangumpadikku neengaL pisaindhamaavil mudhaRpaagaththaiyum aasaariyanukkuk kodukkakkadaveergaL.
31 paRavaigaLilum mirugangaLilum thaanaai seththadhum peeRuNdadhumaana ondraiyum aasaariyargaL pusikkalaagaadhu.
